channel.title: Virtualbox or new pc
channel.description: Hallo guys. I install whonix and i like it so much. But do I have to buy a new laptop for whonix to be anonymous? or enough to install virtualbox and work in it, VirtualBox its like different computer so, am i. right?

item.title: Virtualbox or new pc
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

In general any infected system shouldn’t be used after infection, as it is never possible to predict how good the capabilities of current malware are.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Virtualbox or new pc
item.dc:creator: sonny
item.description:
Ego:

As long as you don’t have malware on your PC and adhere to these rules, you should be fine:

danger is when virus gets on my real computer and then gets into virtualbox? or what?

item.title: Virtualbox or new pc
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

As long as you don’t have malware on your PC and adhere to these rules, you should be fine: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning

Have a nice day,
